title: Disaster Recovery Plan Requirement
description: Ensure that the system has a documented and tested disaster recovery plan.

description.const: The system must have a documented and regularly tested disaster recovery plan.

scope-text.const: All critical trading systems must comply.

test-procedure.description: Detailed procedure on how the disaster recovery plan should be tested.
test-procedure.default: Perform a full failover to the backup site annually.

frequency.description: Frequency at which the disaster recovery plan must be tested.

responsible-team.description: The team responsible for ensuring the disaster recovery plan is documented and tested.

evidence-type.description: Type of evidence required to demonstrate compliance.
evidence-type.default: Test report including failover success metrics.
